channel.title: Ok i got a few problems
channel.description:
Problem number 1.
if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights >= 3){ hail(); }
how do i make it so only I can use that command?
Problem number 2.
I need the cords to the lvl 147 box where kbd is sometimes...
Problem number 3.
how do i add more rights... like theres player rights 0,1,2,3,4 i want to add a 6 and 7 pretty much with the same rights as 3 and 4 but i need a 6 and 7 and how do i edit the rights so 3 and 6 cant trade :S

item.title: Ok i got a few problems
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

For trading,
if(blah blah && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 6)

For adding them, minus the crowns, they’ll do whatever you want. Like, instead of && playerRights == 3 or 4,&& playerRights == 6 or 7
Get my point?

Read full topic

item.title: Ok i got a few problems
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Here is an example to change it so only you can use the command

if (command.startsWith("anycommand") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*yournamehere*"))

Read full topic

hail();
}

how do i make it so only I can use that command?
